A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a good movie with some major blunders. The visuals are\, of course\, amazing! As for the story\, I loved everything with Rey and Luke\, and the third act was quite enjoyable. However\, I didn't care for the new character\, and while Finn is my favorite from the last film\, the side quest he goes on is rather uninteresting\, and doesn't go anywhere. Also\, Po needs more to do. Still\, a very enjoyable film\, mixing some rehash with great new elements!
